text:
Šefik Džaferović (born 9 September 1957) is a Bosnian politician. He is the 8th and current Bosniak Member of the Presidency of Bosnia and Herzegovina.
He is the current Vice-president of the Party of Democratic Action (SDA) as well.
From 2002 until 2018, he was as a senior member of the House of Representatives of Bosnia and Herzegovina.

annotations.surface_form: House of Representatives of Bosnia and Herzegovina
